challenges.title: Q1: Responsive Two-Column to One-Column
challenges.description: Create two content sections side by side (two columns) on desktop. Using a media query, make them stack vertically (one column) when the screen width is less than 600px.
challenges.outputDescription: Layout changes from two columns to one column on small screens.
examples: Use @media (max-width: 600px) and change flex-direction or width.

challenges.title: Q2: Responsive Navbar
challenges.description: Create a simple navbar that displays menu items in a row on desktop. On small screens (width < 600px), increase font size and add more vertical padding to make links easier to tap.
challenges.outputDescription: Navbar looks comfortable on both desktop and mobile widths.
examples: Use media query to change font-size and padding.
